name: The Thing in the Dark
description:
In this game stay in the light to avoid an evil entity trying to get you, see if you can survive until 6 am and escape before the monster can catch you. Armed with only a flashlight with limited uses.

try to keep your battery charge topped up as it is your only way of dealing with the monster.

Try and keep the creature at bay until you can escape. Complete tasks to ensure the lights wont fail.  But most importantly be sure to have fun, and thanks for playing
